```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(r3PGmix)
library(dplyr)
```

## Example

```{r}
sp <- 2
m <- 20

run_3PG(
  siteInputs = array(-999, dim=c(1, 8) ),
  speciesInputs = array(-999, dim=c(sp, 8) ),
  forcingInputs = array(-999, dim=c(m, 6) ),
  parameterInputs = array(-999, dim=c(65, sp) ),
  biasInputs = array(-999, dim=c(47, sp) )
)
```
